title: I have read and loved 'Sacred Games' and 'Shantaram'. Which novel should I read next in order to expand my understanding of India and its people? - Quora

response.answer_text: Neither of these books will give you a complete understanding of India and her people. I think India can't be explained but can only be experienced. And the experience is different for everyone. India is a huge country with every kind of landscape, food variety and languages. If there's anything that you want to know in particular, please ask, we Indians will try to answer.
